title: IBM Certified Container Software for SCCM JSON schema
description: IBM Certified Container Software for SCCM JSON schema.

repository.title: Image Repository
repository.description: Specify the container image registry with image name.

tag.title: Image Tag
tag.description: Specify a valid image tag present on registry.

imageSecrets.title: Image Secrets
imageSecrets.description: Specify the secret to use when pulling the image. Please provide this when using an image from a private registry

enabled.title: Digest Enablement
enabled.description: Enable/disable digest to be used for image pull from registry.

value.title: Image Digest Value
value.description: Specify image digest values to be used for image pull during deployment.

pullPolicy.title: Image Pull Policy
pullPolicy.description: Specify the image pull policy for containers.

nameOverride.title: Name Override
nameOverride.description: This name will be appended to release name to form the name of the resources created by this chart.

create.title: Service Account Create
create.description: Specify true/false to create or not create a service account.

name.title: Service Account Name
name.description: Specify service account name if existing service account is to be use for this deployment.

loadBalancerSourceRanges.title: LoadBalancer IP ranges for Service
loadBalancerSourceRanges.description: Specify the LoadBalancer IP ranges to access the Control Center application.

annotations.title: Service Annotations
annotations.description: Specify the Service annotations if needed.

externalIP.title: ExternalIP For Service
externalIP.description: Specify the External IP to access for SCCM.

ccArgs.title: Configurable Parameters Of The IBM Control Center Monitor Chart

ccInterval.title: Time To Wait Come Back Up In Case Of Application Down

oracleRacOrScan.title: Oracle is Single Client Access Name or not

storageClassName.title: Storage Class Name
storageClassName.description: Specify the Storage Class name for dynamic provisioning for data persistence.

enabled.title: persistent volume for all volumes except user input

useDynamicProvisioning.title: To use storage classes to dynamically create PV

accessMode.title: Access Mode for Persistent Volume Claim

persistentVolumeUserInputs.title: Persistent Volume Claim Configuration For User Inputs

accessMode.title: Access Mode for Persistent Volume Claim

initialDelaySeconds.title: Initial Delay
initialDelaySeconds.description: Specify the initial delay in starting liveness probe in seconds.

timeoutSeconds.title: timeout Seconds
timeoutSeconds.description: Specify the probe timeout in secondss.

periodSeconds.title: Period
periodSeconds.description: Specify the time period between two probes in seconds.

initialDelaySeconds.title: Initial Delay
initialDelaySeconds.description: Specify the initial delay in starting readiness probe in seconds.

timeoutSeconds.title: Timeout
timeoutSeconds.description: Specify the probe timeout in seconds

periodSeconds.title: Time Period
periodSeconds.description: Specify the time period between two probes in seconds.

license.title: License Acceptance
license.description: Please accept license after reading it at https://www-40.ibm.com/software/sla/sladb.nsf (L/N: L-KNAN-C6VGE3)

licenseType.title: License edition for IBM Certified Container Software for SCCM
licenseType.description: Please provide the license type edition as either prod or non-prod for production or non-production respectively.
